info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 06 at 5:50PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Catawba, Alexander, Caldwell and east central Burke Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 550 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles southeast of Blowing Rock, or 6 miles southeast of Blowing Rock In Caldwell County, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Hickory, Lenoir, Taylorsville, Longview, Sawmills, Granite Falls, Gamewell, Bethlehem, Hudson and Icard. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
